value:
It's so boring here. Without any Risen,
who am I supposed to pluck the arms
and legs off of? Flies aren't the same...

I kinda miss wizard school. That's
where I learned to smile all the time!
Also where I got my pain tolerance.

You doing OK, $Nu?$k$pNo battlefield injuries or anything?
I'd hate for you to die yet!

Want to help me with an experiment
real quick? It's a hex that kills 100
people at once!

I've been collecting crow feathers
for a while. I wonder how many I
need to fly...

Say, are you $Nu?$k$pI come with a big hello from
$Nf!

I'm a hex of a lot stronger now.
Ha! Get it?
Ohhh, wow! When did I grow that?
Nya ha! I hardly learned a thing!

Oooh! New powers! So who do
you want me to curse?

Hiya! I'm Henry, and I don't want
to brag, but I'm preeeeetty much
the scariest dark mage in Plegia!

Oh! Planning on sending me
out to kill some more,
$Nu?$k$pNya ha! That's great!$k$pWho's my target? A Hero? Emblian
soldier? Oh! Could it be someone
in the Order of Heroes?$k$pHuh? Allies don't kill each other?
Who told you THAT? Eh, if you say
so, I guess...$k$pThen again, I like this place, and I
wouldn't want anyone to die.$k$pYou won't die, will you,
$Nu?$k$pIf you died, I'd have to invent a
horrible new hex for whoever killed
you. So just...stay alive, OK?
そーれっ
あははっ
うわっ
That smarts...
Here, have some death!
Special delivery!
Ooh! This'll hurt!
It's curse o'clock!
Hurts nice...
Heehee
Wanna play?
Need someone cursed?
All my best friends are crows.
Ready to trade that white cape for a black one like mine?
You don't think I'm scary, do you?
I wonder if it'll hurt when I die...
You need somebody killed? It's no trouble. Like, at all.
OK!
Oh!
You got it!
